Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Ivezic, Z., M. Juric, R.H. Lupton, S. Tabachnik, T. Quinn, and the SDSS Collaboration. SDSS Moving Object Catalog. EAR-A-I0035-3-SDSSMOC-V1.0. NASA Planetary Data System, 2004.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: The Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) Moving Object Catalog lists astrometric and photometric data for moving objects detected in the SDSS.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: The Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) Moving Object Catalog lists astrometric and photometric data for moving objects detected in the SDSS. The catalog includes various identification parameters, SDSS astrometric measurements (five SDSS magnitudes and their errors), and orbital elements for previously cataloged asteroids. The data set also includes a list of the runs from which data are included, and filter response curves.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= Version 1.0 of this data set includes Data Release 1 of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS), including astrometric and photometric data for 58117 moving objects from 87 observing runs through Dec. 15th, 2001. The catalog includes various identification parameters, SDSS astrometric measurements (five SDSS magnitudes and their errors), and orbital elements for previously cataloged asteroids.
An ancillary table lists the observing runs from which data are included in this data release, along with the dates of observation and information about the the sky coverage of each run. A file containing the Sloan filter response curves is also included.
Details of the survey and the moving object catalog may be found in the following publications:
Gunn, J.E. and 39 coauthors, 1998. The Sloan Digital Sky Survey photometric camera. Astron. J. 116, 3040-3081. [GUNNETAL1998]
Stoughton, C. and 191 coauthors, 2002. Sloan Digital Sky Survey: Early release data. Astron. J. 123, 485-548. [STOUGHTONETAL2002]
Ivezik, Z. and 30 coauthors, 2001. Solar system objects observed in the Sloan Digital Sky Survey commissioning data. Astron. J. 122, 2749-2784. [IVEZIKETAL2001]
Juric, M., Z. Ivezik, R.H. Lupton, T. Quinn, S. Tabachnik, X. Fan, J.E. Gunn, G.S. Hennessy, G.R. Knapp, J.A. Munn, J.R. Pier, C.M. Rockosi, D.P. Schneider, J. Brinkmann, I. Csabai and M. Fukugita 2002. Comparison of positions and magnitudes of asteroids observed in the Sloan Digital Sky Survey with those predicted for known asteroids. Astron. J. 124, 1776-1787. [JURICETAL2002]
Fukugita, M., T. Ichigawa, J.E. Gunn, M. Doi, K. Shimasaku, and D.P. Schneider 1996. The Sloan Digital Sky Survey photometric system. Astron. J. 111, 1748-1756. [FUKIGITAETAL1996]
Pier, J.R., J.A. Munn, R.B. Hindsley, G.S. Hennessey, S.M. Kent, R.H. Lupton, and Z. Ivezic 2003. Astrometric calibration of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey. Astron. J. 125, 1559-1579. [PIERETAL2003]
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
This data set underwent external peer review on May 20, 2004.
Erratum: The values of PROP_CAT_ID in the table are incorrectly given as 'ASTDYS_N_20000601' and 'ASTDYS_U_20000601'. The values should be 'ASTDYS_N_20010915' and 'ASTDYS_U_20010915'.
